import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Weather.css"; import axios from "axios" export default function Weather() { let [weatherdata,setW] = useState({}) let apiKey = "caa883a4a60d93878755b08a933f74ea"; let apiUrl = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=London&appid=${apiKey}` axios.get(apiUrl).then(handleResponse); function handleResponse(response){ setTemperature({ temperature: response.data.main.temp, description: response.data.main.temp, humidy: response.data.main.temp, wind: response.data.main.temp, }); } return (
